about_the_game:
Revised Steam Description:

Space Hotel offers a bold new twist on the classic city builder and tycoon genres, taking your management skills beyond the Earth's surface and into orbit. Experience the excitement and challenges of creating and maintaining a luxury space hotel where the stakes are higher and the rewards are out of this world.

As the launch director of Space Hotel Ltd., you're responsible for the world's first orbital luxury hotel, floating high above Earth. Every decision you make shapes the future of space tourism, and the pressure is on to keep things running smoothly. Coordinate guest arrivals, manage cargo logistics, expand your station, and face unexpected crises—all in the unforgiving environment of space.

Ensure your guests enjoy a safe and unforgettable stay among the stars. Balance logistics, luxury, and life-support systems while keeping a close eye on profitability. The future of space travel is in your hands.

Key Features:

Multi-Tiered Simulation

Building your space hotel one launch at a time is easy to pick up, but hard to master. Onboard, you'll manage the delicate balance of life support, sustainability, and the needs of both crew and guests. With 11 unique categories of resources, each with distinct mechanics, you'll need to carefully store, produce, and consume them to maintain your station.

Station Builder

Design and assemble your space hotel one module at a time. Replace the familiar grid system of city builders with the complexities of airlock and flight path management. Keep solar panels operational, facilities interconnected, and ensure there's always an airlock available for arriving guests.

Launch Manager

Plan every launch to ensure critical supplies, new facilities, and guests arrive exactly when needed. Handle emergency launches to avert disaster or create an efficient, long-term launch pipeline to keep the hotel thriving.

Facility Designer

Customize and upgrade each facility before launching it into space. With dozens of unique facilities to mix, match, and combine, you can craft the ultimate guest experience. Will you prioritize guest luxury, crew efficiency, or life support innovations?

Retro Sci-Fi Interface

Relive the golden era of science fiction with a retro GUI inspired by the cool, nostalgic interfaces of 80s and 90s sci-fi movies. The aesthetic, combined with a thematic sound design, delivers an immersive experience that blends retro and futuristic styles.

Near-Future Science and Technology

Set in a plausible near-future where wealthy tourists book rockets to the stars, Space Hotel explores themes of sustainability, innovation, cooperation, and conflict. Every decision carries weight as you balance cutting-edge technology with the realities of space.
